scenario.name: Basic REGISTER, Walter Doekes 2011, with custom register useraddr
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[useraddr]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[useraddr]> Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Expires: 15 Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[useraddr]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[useraddr]> Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Expires: 15 [authentication] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 REGISTER Content-Length: 0
